Package Items.Weapons

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • Items.Item
      • Items.Weapons.Weapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Copper_Axe, Copper_Dagger, Copper_Gladius, Copper_Spear
    public class Weapon
extends Item
    Child class of item. It increases entity damage. Weapon can deal physical and piercing damage. Physical damage can be reduced by receiver's armor. Piercing damage ignores armor.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • setPhysicalDmg

        public void setPhysicalDmg​(int lowPhysDmg,
                           int highPhysDmg)
        This method is used to set the range of physical damage of weapon. Physical damage is lowered by receiver's armor. Physical damage is influenced by player strength. Used in weapon constructors.
        Parameters:
        lowPhysDmg - Lower bound of weapon physical damage.
        highPhysDmg - Higher bound of weapon physical damage.

      • setPiercingDmg

        public void setPiercingDmg​(int lowPiercDmg,
                           int highPiercDmg)
        This method is used to set the range of piercing damage of weapon. Piercing damage ignores armor. Physical damage is influenced by player dexterity. Used in weapon constructors.
        Parameters:
        lowPiercDmg - Lower bound of weapon physical damage.
        highPiercDmg - Higher bound of weapon piercing damage.

      • copy

        public void copy​(Weapon weaponCopy)
        Sets the values of weapon copy.
        Parameters:
        weaponCopy - Copy of weapon.

      • getCopy

        public Weapon getCopy()
        Creates a copy of weapon.
        Specified by:
        getCopy in class Item
        Returns:
        Returns copy of weapon.
